timeline: ~1 week after Chapter 15, days 3-10 of Elara's infiltration
location: Building 47 kitchen, rooftop, distribution center supply room, Jax's office

knows: Jax is perceptive and sees through parts of her cover
He knows she's hiding something but is attracted anyway
She's volunteered in kitchen for 3 days straight
Mother Sera has noticed her asking specific questions
Jax is genetically barred from leaving Level 9 - tried and was rejected
Free Level is genuine, no criminal activity
She's falling for Jax (admitted to herself and him)
She kissed him on the rooftop
They've slept together
Finn has figured out she's not really a Beta worker
Finn threatened her about hurting Jax
She's supposed to confess the truth but can't bring herself to
She's filing false reports to Ashton, downplaying the situation
The lies are getting easier - which terrifies her
Elara Quinn.emotional_state: Deeply compromised, conflicted, falling for Jax, guilt-ridden, unable to confess
Elara Quinn.physical_state: Healthy, maintaining cover while in relationship with Jax
Elara Quinn.relationship_status: Sleeping with Jax while maintaining deception

knows: Elara is hiding something - moves like she's trained for violence
She asks specific questions about funding and operations
She's not a desperate Beta worker fleeing debts
She's too controlled and deliberate
Mother Sera thinks something is off about her
Despite all this, he's falling for her anyway
She picked the roof lock easily
She's the most interesting thing to happen to him in months
She makes him want to trust people again
They've kissed and are now sleeping together
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Attracted, falling for Elara, aware she's hiding things but choosing to trust anyway, lonely and wanting connection
Jax Varro.physical_state: Using Drift when weight gets heavy, managing operations
Jax Varro.vulnerability: Admitting he's afraid of trusting her, admitting he feels less alone with her
Jax Varro.relationship_status: Sleeping with Elara despite knowing she's hiding something

knows: Elara is sleeping with Jax
She's not a Beta worker - moves like someone trained for violence
She's not desperate or broken enough to be genuine
She asks questions like she's gathering intelligence
She started using Jax but claims it's changed
Jax is falling for her (actually falling, not just attracted)
When Jax finds out she's been lying, it will destroy him
Finn.emotional_state: Suspicious, protective of Jax, angry, giving Elara ultimatum
Finn.action: Confronted Elara, demanded she tell truth or leave
Finn.ultimatum: Tell Jax the truth or leave before causing more damage

knows: Elara reports Free Level operation appears genuine
She's recommending downgraded threat assessment
Funding confirmed as personal wealth
She hasn't identified all sources yet
Director Ashton.instruction: Continue investigation, identify funding sources, don't compromise cover
Director Ashton.ignorance: Doesn't know Elara is romantically involved with Jax

revealed_to_reader: Jax watched Elara for 3 days before approaching her alone
They're both assessing each other consciously
Elara trained to handle interrogations, charm, attraction
Jax is different - not trying to charm, just present and real
Elara volunteered in kitchen 3 days straight
Jax noticed she asks specific questions about funding, supply chains, operations
He can tell she moves like someone trained to be invisible
Mother Sera has reported Elara's questioning to Jax
Elara filed false report to Ashton - downplayed threat, omitted key facts
Ashton told her to continue investigation and not compromise cover
Jax goes to Building 47 roof when weight gets heavy
Roof is technically restricted (structural/safety), but lock is easy to bypass
Jax uses Drift when pressure is too much - admits he's addicted
He tried to leave Level 9, was rejected by scanner - genetically barred
Built Free Level because cage forced him to do something that matters
Quote: 'Sometimes the cage is what forces you to do something that matters'
Elara told version of truth: feeling she's participating in something wrong, deserves to lose it
Jax to Elara: 'You make me want to trust you. I've learned not to trust people who make me feel things'
Elara: 'What do I make you feel?' Jax: 'Like maybe I'm not as alone as I thought'
They kissed on the rooftop - desperate and certain, not gentle
Jax tastes like Drift and rain
Elara pulled away first, admitted 'I'm not who you think I am'
Jax: 'I know. But right now I don't care'
They kissed again, are now sleeping together
Elara didn't report the kiss or relationship to Ashton
Her lies in reports are getting easier
Finn confronted Elara 3 days after first kiss
Finn figured out she's not Beta worker - too trained, asks intelligence questions
Elara admitted: 'It started that way. It's not anymore'
Finn warned if she hurts Jax, they'll make her regret it
Finn: Jax is 'barely holding together' and discovery will 'destroy something in him'
Finn's ultimatum: tell truth or leave
Elara tried to confess to Jax, couldn't do it
Instead told him 'I'm falling for you and it scares me'
Kept postponing confession day after day
Ending: 'The lies were getting easier. And that was the most terrifying thing of all.'
